query:
SELECT
            warps.*,
            COALESCE(characters_text.name, light_cones_text.name) AS name
        FROM
            warps
        LEFT JOIN
            characters_text
        ON
            characters_text.id = character AND characters_text.language = $3
        LEFT JOIN
            light_cones_text
        ON
            light_cones_text.id = light_cone AND light_cones_text.language = $3
        WHERE
            uid = $1
        AND
            gacha_type = $2
        ORDER BY
            id
